fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack
- 2 Uses: Heal yourself by 1 HP
- 1 Use: Remove all negative status effects off of yourself, such as douses, hexes, etc.
- 1 Use: Learn a player's role. Cannot be used before Night 3.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The King has 6 HP. Any attack that would kill him will instead reduce his HP by 1.
- The King can only die if his HP reaches 0, or he is hanged.
- Anything that heals the King will increased his HP, up to a maximum of 6.
- The King is automatically revealed at the start of the game.
- If the King dies, Town has exactly 2 days and 2 nights afterwards to kill all of their enemies. If time is up and Town hasn't won yet, they will automatically lose.
- The King cannot use or hear whispers.
- The King can only be rerolled by choice at the start of the game. Other roles are incapable of forcefully rerolling the King into another role.
- If you kill a townie, you will lose a charge from a random ability that has one. If you don't have ability charges to use, you will instead lose the ability to attack.
- The M-63 Plamen Artillery Piece can only attack the King up to 2 times per night.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: - At the start of the game, the King may opt to name his Kingdom (AKA the current game) into anything he wants. This feature is very important and entirely cosmetic.
